channel.title: (728) npcs can attack players, but players cant
channel.description: Hey guys so i finaly got my server up (about frigin time) and now i have encounterd a problem with my corperal beast and a couple other npcs, for some reason a player can go up to the corpreal beast but as soon as the player clicks on him the npc just attacks the player and the player wont attack back. Please le me know if you can help me out with this :) thanks

item.title: (728) npcs can attack players, but players cant
